segments.text: Has Mien sold his house yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he has . He sold it last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Has he moved to his new house yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not yet . He's still here . He's going to move tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Tomorrow afternoon . I'll miss him . He has always been a good neighbour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's a very nice person . We will all miss him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When will the new people move into this house ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that they will move in the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you see Mien today , Janey ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please give him my regards . Poor Mien ! He didn't want to leave this house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he didn't want to leave , but his wife did !
segments.speaker: S1
